Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Round Seal Engraved with Cross
Description: The round seal, which is used protect the contents of a container, is engraved with a cross in the middle whose four beams end in triple branches. Between the four beams is a repeated ornament that consists of a leaning cross inside a square. The cross is surrounded by an ornamental engraving of triangles. The Christians were in the habit of putting the cross on everything so as to bless the contents
